“Extending the life of our product families 
through expert repairs, performance 
upgrades, as well as refurbishment of older 
systems contributes to the sustainability of 
our customers’ operations and also reduces 
industry waste as a whole.” 
Brian Lorig
EVP, KLA Services
Breathing New Life 
into Legacy Systems
Many device components serving the 
IoT, automotive, mobile, µLED and other 
specialized market segments use larger 
design nodes or have unique substrate 
or material requirements. Our process-
control and process-enabling solutions 
have long lifecycles, and KLA products 
can often be upgraded with evolving 
technology so customers can continue 
realizing value from their existing 
equipment. In addition to standard service 
offerings, KLA offers a portfolio of certified 
and remanufactured 150mm and 200mm 
tools and performance enhancements, as 
well as adaptable 200mm/300mm tools in 
support of all semiconductor device types. 
This extends the life of our tools, reduces 
waste and helps our customers keep pace 
with product innovation more sustainably.
